thread.title: James Thornell
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by James Thornell

author: James Thornell
title: James Thornell
text:
TO ALL POTENTIAL SCANNER PURCHASERS >>>>>
If you are on the fence and can't decide which side to jump on then maybe this will help you get to the right side.. I looked, talked and played with all types of scanners before my purchase with ZIP SCANNERS. Nixon with zip scanners truly is the right choice. His knowledge, response to emails anything that I needed or asked of him has been quick and painless from the purchase to the follow up after I received my purchase. VERY VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER!!! Thanks again Nixon.
